title: 08/26/21 DPS Hour 2 Adam Sandler
itunes:title: 08/26/21 DPS Hour 2 Adam Sandler
description:
Adam Sandler tells Dan that his dad told him that he would never make it as a pro baseball player. Adam says that his dad supported him as a comedian right away.
